block.p: A leading refugee agency said two years of warfare in eastern Congo have caused the deaths of more than 1.7 million people. Many of them died from hunger and malaria after fleeing the fighting, according to the agency, the International Rescue Committee. The survey, conducted in April and May, assessed the death toll in a five-province area with 18 million people.
